channel.title: How do i make it so players can open doors or go to the other side of it? and
channel.description:
1.How do i set it so i can open a door or when i click it go on the other side?
2. How do i set objects in my server?
3. is there a way to change the price of items in my server?
please answer one two or all three of these for me i really need help with my server.

item.title: How do i make it so players can open doors or go to the other side of it? and
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Idiot…
It has something to do with the case. Make one, then have in it something like

robject(DOOR ID, absX, absY, -1, 10); //DOOR OPEN

It replaces ® the object with the new door at the current coords (absX, absY) and changes the direction (-1 = north facing).
I can help…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make it so players can open doors or go to the other side of it? and
item.dc:creator: @owned654321241 owned654321241
item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

to make object you need to do Fedexers Global Object Tut –

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

for the door thing.
dont even worry aboutit. it would be VERY hard.

and for the prices. go to item.cfg and find the item you are looking for (they are in numerical order) then the first few numbers (it has alot of decimal places) is the shop price for the item. you can change it there. as for the street price there is nothingyou can do unless you like moniter every trade and make sure allthe prices are the way you want them.
